metadata.description: This first-ever ZvR special not only reunites co-creators Chris Ryall & Ashley Wood, but it opens the ZvR world to other creators, too. Creators like novelists Daniel Wilson (Robopocalypse) and Rio Youers, artists Sam Kieth and Andy Kuhn! In "Seasons of War," each creative team looks at a different season of the zombie-robot apocalypse!
metadata.name: Zombies Vs Robots
